meanings.definition: Attractive or stylish items or objects.
meanings.sent1: She loved to collect nifties like shiny jewelry and colorful scarves.
meanings.sent2: The boutique displayed various nifties in its window to attract customers.
meanings.sent3: The nifties on the shelf seemed to sparkle and wink at her as she passed by.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a treasure trove of nifties, each one holding a special memory.
meanings.sent5: The nifties in the antique shop seemed to whisper stories of their past to anyone who listened.

meanings.definition: Clever or ingenious ideas or solutions.
meanings.sent1: His latest invention was a real nifty, solving a problem no one else could.
meanings.sent2: The team brainstormed nifties to improve efficiency in the workplace.
meanings.sent3: The nifty idea of using a paperclip as a bookmark saved the day.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of nifties, always coming up with creative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The nifties that popped into his head during the exam helped him ace the test.
